text: Valhalla is a hamlet and census-designated place (CDP) located within the town of Mount Pleasant, in Westchester County, New York, United States, in the New York City metropolitan area. Its population was 3,213 at the 2020 U.S. Census. ==References== Category:Hamlets in New York (state) Category:Census-designated places in New York (state)
title: Valhalla, New York
